title: Continuous Glucose Monitoring in the Management of Gestational Diabetes in Switzerland (DipGluMo): An Open-Label, Single-Centre, Randomized, Controlled Trial.
abstract: (Abstracted from Lancet Diabetes Endocrinol 2025;13:591-599) The incidence rate for gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) is as high as 14%, making it one of the more common complications of pregnancy. Glycemic control is an important factor in the treatment of GDM and includes self-monitoring of blood glucose (SMBG).
clean_text: continuous glucose monitoring in the management of gestational diabetes in switzerland dipglumo an open label single centre randomized controlled trial abstracted from lancet diabetes endocrinol the incidence rate for gestational diabetes mellitus gdm is as high as making it one of the more common complications of pregnancy glycemic control is an important factor in the treatment of gdm and includes self monitoring of blood glucose smbg
